title: Afghan migrant shot dead by police on Bulgarian border
text:
Afghan migrant shot dead by police on Bulgarian border 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
A man from Afghanistan has been shot dead near the border with Turkey after being hit by a ricochet from a warning shot fired by border poli...
